name: Do No Harm (n00begon)
description:
You're a doctor! Astronaut John Dorian is unconscious in Space Lab 5. Use the console to remotely administer drugs to get his heart rate back to the normal range. Hurry, we are losing signal with the Space Lab!

Created for Global Game Jam 2018 

Team: Tim Bennett, Aaron Jackson, Morgan Lieshout and Tim Neumegen.
Music by Tim Bennett.
Heart beep sound: samfk360 @ freesound under CC.
